metadata.description: In the world of the Eisner Award-winning Black Hammer series—but one hundred years in the future—a collection of superheroes, inspired by the legendary heroes of Black Hammer Farm, must band together to save the planet from an authoritarian regime. A young Martian must find a way to reform The Quantum League to save the world, while solving the riddle of what happened to the great heroes of the twentieth century. Black Hammer creators Jeff Lemire (The Terrifics) and Wilfredo Torres (Legion) illustrates and Dave Stewart (Hellboy) adds his colorist skills to the mix. Collects The Quantum Age #1-#6.
metadata.name: Quantum Age: From the World of Black Hammer
